description: Entity Framework Core migration designer code that defines the database schema for the initial migration, including entities for User, FriendRequest, and Message with their properties and indexes.

classes.name: _0001_Initial
classes.description: Partial class representing the initial database migration, responsible for building the target model schema.

methods.name: BuildTargetModel
methods.description: Defines the database schema for the entities involved in the application, setting up properties, keys, indexes, and table mappings.
